Council Liaison Appointments

Liaison is defined as to perform as neither an advocate nor an opponent but rather to act as a conduit for organizations, staff, boards, commissions, committees, etc. to facilitate communication between Council and entity without prejudice. The mayor is an automatic liaison to all departments, boards & committees.

Board / Commission / Department / Organization Liaison Email Address
Double Oak Volunteer Fire Department Patrick Johnson patrick.johnson@doubleoak.texas.gov
Double Oak Police Department Pat Wellen pat.wellen@doubleoak.texas.gov
Planning & Zoning Commission Mike Gwartney mike.gwartney@doubleoak.texas.gov
Board of Adjustment Mark Dietrich mark.dietrich@doubleoak.texas.gov
Upper Trinity Regional Water District Dave Nelson dave.nelson@doubleoak.texas.gov
Cross Timbers Water Supply Corporation Curtis Glover (08/15/2022) curtis.glover@doubleoak.texas.gov
School Districts/Denton County & Neighboring Towns Patrick Johnson patrick.johnson@doubleoak.texas.gov

If you have an idea for a committee not listed, or an area not being addressed by any of these groups, or for details about any of the existing committees, please contact the Mayor, Town Administrator, or any Town Council member. If you'd like to volunteer for a committee, check out our Volunteer page.
